name: Puzzle Cube
description:
Puzzle Cube was initially developed as a game jam entry for the theme "Life in 2 Dimensions". It provides a variation on the challenge of solving the 3x3 cube, by limiting the view of the 3D cube to a 2D perspective and limiting the controls somewhat. The cube can be manipulated to any of the possible configurations that a Rubik's Cube* can.

This current version of Puzzle Cube has been developed and is being published as a resume piece. Because of this, it will always be free! With enough interest, development will continue, adding more features to the game.

FEATURES


  • Online Leaderboards
  • Various Music, Background, & Cube Skin settings
  • The timer can be disabled (must return to the main menu to re-enable it)
  • Tutorial Video Link for learning to solve the cube
  • Keyboard & Controller support (tested w/XBox One Controller)


* Puzzle Cube is not associated with or endorsed by Rubik's Cube. This software does not infringe on any Rubik's Cube patents or trademarks. Copyright does not apply to the physical Rubik's Cube product.
